document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus muscarius species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) with description of thirteen new species from Palaearctic and Oriental regions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus muscarius species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae) with description of thirteen new species from Palaearctic and Oriental regions

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 77. Distribution of the
Agrilus muscarius
species-group.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type series
.
Agrilus mirei
Descarpentries & Villiers, 1963
. Holotype : 3 , MNHN : “ TONKIN [p] VII [h] Hoa-Binh leg. A de Cooman [p][orange label] \ Agrilus mirei n. sp. Holotype 3 nob[is]. A. Descarpentries et [h] A. Villiers det. 19 [p] 62 [h] \ Muséum Paris Coll. générale [p] [yellow label]”. The exact number of paratypes was not specified.
Type locality
. Tonkin : Hoa Binh.

Specimens examined .
VIETNAM
: Hoa Binh : 1 ex ( EJCB ): “ Tonkin , Région de Hoa Binh”; Ninh Binh : 1 Ƥ ( EJCB ): “ Vietnam N, Tonkin , Cuc-Phuong nat.park,
2–12 .V. 1991
, E. Jendek leg.”; 2 3 ( EJCB ): “N Vietnam , 20 ° 15 N, 105 ° 42 E, 75 km SW of Hanoi,
21–22 .v. 1996
, Cuc Phuong, Dembický & Pacholátko leg.”.
Distribution . northern Vietnam : Hoa Binh, Ninh Binh.
